meanings.definition: The act of reviving or being revived.
meanings.sent1: The reviviscences of the old theater brought back fond memories.
meanings.sent2: Her reviviscences of childhood adventures filled her with joy.
meanings.sent3: The reviviscences of the sleepy cat waking up always make me smile.
meanings.sent4: The reviviscences of the garden blooming after winter felt like a miracle.
meanings.sent5: The reviviscences of the sun rising over the mountains were breathtaking.

meanings.definition: Memories or experiences that are brought back to life or remembered.
meanings.sent1: Listening to the old song brought back sweet reviviscences of her youth.
meanings.sent2: His reviviscences of the family picnic made him nostalgic.
meanings.sent3: The reviviscences of the mischievous puppy always make us laugh.
meanings.sent4: The reviviscences of the first snowfall painted a picture of innocence.
meanings.sent5: The reviviscences of the ocean waves crashing against the shore were vivid.
